name: Lemon Bread
description: This easy lemon bread is light, bright and fluffy! It's topped with a sweet lemon glaze, and it's perfect for brunch, birthdays and MORE!
ingredients: 2 cups milk (Whole, or whatever you have on hand)
1 tablespoon lemon zest (about the zest of 1 lemon)
instructions: Grease 6 mini loaf pans and preheat oven to 350℉. In a large mixing bowl, combine sugar, flour, baking powder and salt. In the fitted bowl of a stand mixer (or a traditional mixing bowl where you can mix by hand) beat the eggs, milk, oil, lemon extract and zest. Gradually add dry mixture to wet until just moist. Do not over-mix. Pour batter into pans, filling to an inch below the top to compensate for rise. Optional: sprinkle sugar on top. Bake 40 minutes. Allow to cool 10 minutes before removing from loaf pan. Meanwhile, combining lemon drizzle ingredients until smooth. Warm and pour to cover lemon loaf.
